[et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ next_background_color=”#ffffff” _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” use_background_color_gradient=”on” background_color_gradient_stops=”rgba(0,0,0,0.5) 0%|rgba(0,0,0,0.1) 98%” background_color_gradient_overlays_image=”on” background_image=”https://clear2close.us/wp-content/uploads/2022/09/header-bg-image-05-scaled.jpg” background_enable_video_mp4=”off” custom_margin=”0px||0px||false|false” custom_padding=”140px||150px||false|false” bottom_divider_style=”asymmetric” animation_style=”fade” animation_speed_curve=”ease” background_last_edited=”on|tablet” use_background_color_gradient_tablet=”on” background_color_gradient_stops_tablet=”rgba(7,7,7,0.3) 0%|rgba(7,7,7,0.3) 100%” background_color_gradient_overlays_image_tablet=”on” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” custom_margin=”0px||0px||false|false” custom_padding=”0px||0px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.17.6″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” header_font=”|700|||||||” header_text_align=”center” header_text_color=”#FFFFFF” header_font_size=”56px” header_line_height=”1.3em” custom_margin=”0px||11px||false|false” custom_padding=”0px||0px||false|false” header_font_size_tablet=”55px” header_font_size_phone=”38px” header_font_size_last_edited=”on|tablet” header_text_shadow_style=”preset2″ global_colors_info=”{}”]

Texas Endorsement Explained

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_url=”/contact-us/” url_new_window=”on” button_text=”Get In Touch” button_alignment=”center” _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” custom_button=”on” button_text_size=”21px” button_text_color=”#FFFFFF” button_bg_color=”#000000″ button_border_color=”RGBA(255,255,255,0)” button_border_radius=”0px” button_font=”Overpass|700|||||||” button_icon=”||fa||900″ button_on_hover=”off” custom_margin=”0px||0px||false|false” custom_padding=”11px|46px|12px|30px|false|false” global_colors_info=”{}” button_bg_color__hover_enabled=”on|hover” button_bg_color__hover=”#FFFFFF” button_bg_enable_color__hover=”on” button_letter_spacing__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” button_letter_spacing__hover=”0px” button_text_color__hover_enabled=”on|hover” button_text_color__hover=”#000000″][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”||5%||false|false” bottom_divider_style=”arrow” bottom_divider_color=”#000000″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” max_width=”80%” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” header_2_font=”|700|||||||” header_2_text_align=”center” header_2_text_color=”#222d35″ header_2_font_size=”35px” custom_margin=”0px||20px||false|false” custom_padding=”0px||0px||false|false” header_2_font_size_tablet=”35px” header_2_font_size_phone=”30px” header_2_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” header_2_line_height_tablet=”” header_2_line_height_phone=”1.3em” header_2_line_height_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Texas Policy Endorsements For Residential
Properties Loan Policy (T-2 or T-2R)

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_toggle title=”Area and Boundary Exception Amendment (f/k/a survey deletion)” open_toggle_text_color=”#2b2b2b” closed_toggle_background_color=”#2b2b2b” _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” title_text_color=”#FFFFFF” title_font=”Gilda Display|600|||||||” title_font_size=”18px” closed_title_font=”Gilda Display||||||||” body_font=”Overpass||||||||” body_text_color=”#2b2b2b” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Cost: No charge for amendment on a Loan Policy.
When Needed: Optional coverage for lenders.
Protects: Provides coverage by amending the area and boundary exception to delete all except “shortages in area” for matters that might be disclosed by a survey.

[/et_pb_toggle][et_pb_toggle title=”Tax Amendment Endorsement (T-30) %91deletion regarding roll back language%93″ open_toggle_text_color=”#2b2b2b” closed_toggle_background_color=”#2b2b2b” _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” title_text_color=”#FFFFFF” title_font=”Gilda Display|600|||||||” title_font_size=”18px” closed_title_font=”Gilda Display||||||||” body_font=”Overpass||||||||” body_text_color=”#2b2b2b” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Cost: $20.00
When Needed: Generally required by lenders, but not available if assessed taxes for the current year are based on an agriculture or open-space valuation.
Protects: Amends the tax exception in the Loan Policy to provide coverage against rollback taxes for prior years due to a change in land use or ownership.

[/et_pb_toggle][et_pb_toggle title=”Tax Amendment Endorsement (T-3) %91addition regarding taxes not yet due and payable%93″ open_toggle_text_color=”#2b2b2b” closed_toggle_background_color=”#2b2b2b” _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” title_text_color=”#FFFFFF” title_font=”Gilda Display|600|||||||” title_font_size=”18px” closed_title_font=”Gilda Display||||||||” body_font=”Overpass||||||||” body_text_color=”#2b2b2b” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Cost: $5.00
When Needed: Generally required by lenders, and available when taxes for the current year are “not yet due and payable”.
Protects: Provides coverage that taxes for the current year are not yet due and payable.

[/et_pb_toggle][et_pb_toggle title=”Environmental Protection Lien (T-36)” open_toggle_text_color=”#2b2b2b” closed_toggle_background_color=”#2b2b2b” _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” title_text_color=”#FFFFFF” title_font=”Gilda Display|600|||||||” title_font_size=”18px” closed_title_font=”Gilda Display||||||||” body_font=”Overpass||||||||” body_text_color=”#2b2b2b” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Cost: $25.00
When Needed: Optional coverage generally required by lenders.
Protects: Provides coverage that there is no failure of priority of the loan due to certain recorded environmental liens.

[/et_pb_toggle][et_pb_toggle title=”Planned Unit Development Endorsement (T-17)” open_toggle_text_color=”#2b2b2b” closed_toggle_background_color=”#2b2b2b” _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” title_text_color=”#FFFFFF” title_font=”Gilda Display|600|||||||” title_font_size=”18px” closed_title_font=”Gilda Display||||||||” body_font=”Overpass||||||||” body_text_color=”#2b2b2b” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Cost: $25.00 for the first loan policy. If additional loan policies are issued simultaneously, there is no additional charge for the endorsement on any other simultaneously issued loan policies.
When Needed: When property is located in a platted subdivision or a condominium unit. This endorsement may not be issued with a Condominium Endorsement (T-28).
Protects: Provides additional coverage to the lender with regard to restrictive covenants, homeowners association charges and assessments, encroachments and the exercise of rights of first refusal.

[/et_pb_toggle][et_pb_toggle title=”Restrictions, Encroachments, and Minerals Endorsement (T-19)” open_toggle_text_color=”#2b2b2b” closed_toggle_background_color=”#2b2b2b” _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” title_text_color=”#FFFFFF” title_font=”Gilda Display|600|||||||” title_font_size=”18px” closed_title_font=”Gilda Display||||||||” body_font=”Overpass||||||||” body_text_color=”#2b2b2b” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Cost: 5% of the Basic Rate for a single issue policy, but with a minimum of $50.00.
When Needed: When coverage against loss resulting from violations of CCRs or against encroachment of and damage to improvements caused by surface entry for mineral development is requested.
Protects: Provides coverage to the lender against loss due to a present or future violation of CCRs affecting the property and protects against the encroachment of improvements and damage to improvements associated with the surface entry for mineral development.

[/et_pb_toggle][et_pb_toggle title=”Minerals and Surface Damage Endorsement (T-19.2)” open_toggle_text_color=”#2b2b2b” closed_toggle_background_color=”#2b2b2b” _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” title_text_color=”#FFFFFF” title_font=”Gilda Display|600|||||||” title_font_size=”18px” closed_title_font=”Gilda Display||||||||” body_font=”Overpass||||||||” body_text_color=”#2b2b2b” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Cost: No charge for endorsement on a Loan Policy.
When Needed: When mineral extraction or development is possible.
Protects: Provides coverage against damage to improvements (excluding lawns, shrubbery, or trees) located on the land resulting from the use of the surface for extraction or development of coal, lignite, oil, gas or other minerals.

[/et_pb_toggle][et_pb_toggle title=”Balloon Mortgage Endorsement (T-39)” open_toggle_text_color=”#2b2b2b” closed_toggle_background_color=”#2b2b2b” _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” title_text_color=”#FFFFFF” title_font=”Gilda Display|600|||||||” title_font_size=”18px” closed_title_font=”Gilda Display||||||||” body_font=”Overpass||||||||” body_text_color=”#2b2b2b” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Cost: $25.00 when issued simultaneously with the Loan Policy or $50.00 if issued subsequent to the Loan Policy.
When Needed: When the Loan Policy includes a balloon rider.
Protects: Provides coverage that the insured lien is not invalid or unenforceable and there is no loss of priority due to the provisions in the loan that provide for a balloon payment.

[/et_pb_toggle][et_pb_toggle title=”Co-Insurance Endorsement (T-48)” open_toggle_text_color=”#2b2b2b” closed_toggle_background_color=”#2b2b2b” _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” title_text_color=”#FFFFFF” title_font=”Gilda Display|600|||||||” title_font_size=”18px” closed_title_font=”Gilda Display||||||||” body_font=”Overpass||||||||” body_text_color=”#2b2b2b” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Cost: No rate rule specific to a charge for the T-48 Endorsement, but rather provides that the premium shall be apportioned between different companies on a pro rata basis.
When Needed: When the total risk exceeds $15,000,000.00 and the risk is apportioned among two or more underwriters.
Protects: Provides coverage that each Co-Insuring Company is liable to the Insured only for its Percentage of Liability of the total loss or damage, costs, attorneys’ fees, and expenses provided in the policy Conditions.

[/et_pb_toggle][et_pb_toggle title=”Completion of Improvements (T-3)” open_toggle_text_color=”#2b2b2b” closed_toggle_background_color=”#2b2b2b” _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” title_text_color=”#FFFFFF” title_font=”Gilda Display|600|||||||” title_font_size=”18px” closed_title_font=”Gilda Display||||||||” body_font=”Overpass||||||||” body_text_color=”#2b2b2b” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Cost: No charge for endorsement on a Loan Policy.
When Needed: When a Loan Policy was issued insuring a construction loan and improvements are completed.
Protects: Brings coverage to date as to Mechanic’s Lien claims. And, if a satisfactory survey is made after completion of improvements, additional coverage may also be provided.

[/et_pb_toggle][et_pb_toggle title=”Condominium Endorsement (T-28)” open_toggle_text_color=”#2b2b2b” closed_toggle_background_color=”#2b2b2b” _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” title_text_color=”#FFFFFF” title_font=”Gilda Display|600|||||||” title_font_size=”18px” closed_title_font=”Gilda Display||||||||” body_font=”Overpass||||||||” body_text_color=”#2b2b2b” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Cost: No charge for endorsement on a Loan Policy.
When Needed: When a condominium unit secures the loan.
Protects: Provides coverage that the condominium unit is part of a condominium regime that is compliant with Texas laws governing the creation and maintenance of condominiums. This endorsement may not be issued with the T-17 Planned Unit Development Endorsement.

[/et_pb_toggle][et_pb_toggle title=”Equity Loan Mortgage (Supplemental Coverage) Endorsement (T-42.1)” open_toggle_text_color=”#2b2b2b” closed_toggle_background_color=”#2b2b2b” _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” title_text_color=”#FFFFFF” title_font=”Gilda Display|600|||||||” title_font_size=”18px” closed_title_font=”Gilda Display||||||||” body_font=”Overpass||||||||” body_text_color=”#2b2b2b” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Cost:15% of the Basic Rate for a single issue policy.
When Needed:When a home equity loan is being insured, and the T-42 Equity Loan Mortgage Endorsement is also issued.
Protects:Provides coverage that the home equity lien is not invalid, unenforceable, and there is no loss of priority due to a lack of compliance with eleven constitutional requirements.

[/et_pb_toggle][et_pb_toggle title=”Future Advance/Revolving Credit Endorsement (T-35)” open_toggle_text_color=”#2b2b2b” closed_toggle_background_color=”#2b2b2b” _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” title_text_color=”#FFFFFF” title_font=”Gilda Display|600|||||||” title_font_size=”18px” closed_title_font=”Gilda Display||||||||” body_font=”Overpass||||||||” body_text_color=”#2b2b2b” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Cost:$50.00
When Needed:When a loan secures a revolving credit indebtedness that meets the criteria for the endorsement.
Protects:Provides coverage that the loan is not invalid, unenforceable and there is no loss of priority of the loan due to provisions that provide for future advances on a revolving line of credit.

[/et_pb_toggle][et_pb_toggle title=”Leasehold Endorsement (T-5)” open_toggle_text_color=”#2b2b2b” closed_toggle_background_color=”#2b2b2b” _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” title_text_color=”#FFFFFF” title_font=”Gilda Display|600|||||||” title_font_size=”18px” closed_title_font=”Gilda Display||||||||” body_font=”Overpass||||||||” body_text_color=”#2b2b2b” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Cost:No charge for endorsement on a Loan Policy.
When Needed: Mandatory when a Loan Policy is to be issued on a leasehold estate.
Protects:Modifies the Loan Policy to add provisions related to how loss and damages are calculated under a policy that insures a loan secured by a leasehold estate.

[/et_pb_toggle][et_pb_toggle title=”Manufactured Housing Unit Endorsement (T-31)” open_toggle_text_color=”#2b2b2b” closed_toggle_background_color=”#2b2b2b” _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” title_text_color=”#FFFFFF” title_font=”Gilda Display|600|||||||” title_font_size=”18px” closed_title_font=”Gilda Display||||||||” body_font=”Overpass||||||||” body_text_color=”#2b2b2b” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Cost: $20.00
When Needed: When a manufactured housing unit has been designated as real property or paperwork required to designate the MHU as real property will be processed and perfected as part of the closing.
Protects: Provides coverage that a manufactured housing unit has been affixed to the land described in Schedule A so as to become part of the real property securing the loan.

[/et_pb_toggle][et_pb_toggle title=”Down Date Endorsement (T-3)” open_toggle_text_color=”#2b2b2b” closed_toggle_background_color=”#2b2b2b” _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” title_text_color=”#FFFFFF” title_font=”Gilda Display|600|||||||” title_font_size=”18px” closed_title_font=”Gilda Display||||||||” body_font=”Overpass||||||||” body_text_color=”#2b2b2b” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Cost: $50.00
When Needed: As construction advances are made on a construction loan insured by a Loan Policy.
Protects: Provides coverage by amending the Loan Policy liability amount to include the total amount of construction disbursements made as of the effective date of the endorsement.

[/et_pb_toggle][et_pb_toggle title=”Equity Loan Mortgage Endorsement (T-42)” open_toggle_text_color=”#2b2b2b” closed_toggle_background_color=”#2b2b2b” _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” title_text_color=”#FFFFFF” title_font=”Gilda Display|600|||||||” title_font_size=”18px” closed_title_font=”Gilda Display||||||||” body_font=”Overpass||||||||” body_text_color=”#2b2b2b” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Cost: 10% of the Basic Rate for a single issue policy.
When Needed: When a home equity loan is being insured.
Protects: Provides coverage that the home equity loan is not invalid or unenforceable due to a failure to comply with the constitution, statutes, and regulations applicable to home equity loans.

[/et_pb_toggle][et_pb_toggle title=”Manufactured Housing Unit (Supplemental Coverage) Endorsement (T-31.1)” open_toggle_text_color=”#2b2b2b” closed_toggle_background_color=”#2b2b2b” _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” title_text_color=”#FFFFFF” title_font=”Gilda Display|600|||||||” title_font_size=”18px” closed_title_font=”Gilda Display||||||||” body_font=”Overpass||||||||” body_text_color=”#2b2b2b” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Cost: $50.00
When Needed: When an insured loan is secured by a manufactured housing unit that has been designated as real property or paperwork required to designate the MHU as real property will be processed and perfected as part of the closing.
Protects: Provides coverage that a manufactured housing unit has been affixed to the land, has been converted To real property and that there are no personal property taxes or personal property liens attached to the MHU.

[/et_pb_toggle][et_pb_toggle title=”Modification Endorsement (T-38)” open_toggle_text_color=”#2b2b2b” closed_toggle_background_color=”#2b2b2b” _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” title_text_color=”#FFFFFF” title_font=”Gilda Display|600|||||||” title_font_size=”18px” closed_title_font=”Gilda Display||||||||” body_font=”Overpass||||||||” body_text_color=”#2b2b2b” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Cost: $100.00 is issued within one year of the original Loan Policy. There is an additional $10.00 charge for each additional twelve month period thereafter, or portion thereof.
When Needed: When an insured loan is modified to a) release part of the land, b) release additional collateral, c) modify the loan instrument by entering into a Modification Agreement, d) reinstate the loan by entering into a Reinstatement Agreement, or d) release the borrowers from personal liability.
Protects: Provides coverage that the insured loan has not been reduced or terminated by the modification of certain loan terms.

[/et_pb_toggle][et_pb_toggle title=”Reverse Mortgage Endorsement (T-43)” open_toggle_text_color=”#2b2b2b” closed_toggle_background_color=”#2b2b2b” _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” title_text_color=”#FFFFFF” title_font=”Gilda Display|600|||||||” title_font_size=”18px” closed_title_font=”Gilda Display||||||||” body_font=”Overpass||||||||” body_text_color=”#2b2b2b” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Cost: No charge for endorsement on a Loan Policy.
When Needed: When insuring a loan covering a Reverse Mortgage.
Protects: Provides coverage that a reverse mortgage is not invalid or unenforceable due to failure to comply with constitutional requirements applicable to reverse mortgages.

[/et_pb_toggle][et_pb_toggle title=”Variable Rate Mortgage Endorsement (T-33)” open_toggle_text_color=”#2b2b2b” closed_toggle_background_color=”#2b2b2b” _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” title_text_color=”#FFFFFF” title_font=”Gilda Display|600|||||||” title_font_size=”18px” closed_title_font=”Gilda Display||||||||” body_font=”Overpass||||||||” body_text_color=”#2b2b2b” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Cost: $20.00
When Needed: When an insured loan secures a variable rate mortgage note.
Protects: Provides coverage that the loan is not invalid, unenforceable, and there is no loss of priority due to provisions in the loan that provide for changes in the interest rate.

[/et_pb_toggle][et_pb_toggle title=”Variable Rate Mortgage – Negative Amortization Endorsement (T-33.1)” open_toggle_text_color=”#2b2b2b” closed_toggle_background_color=”#2b2b2b” _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” title_text_color=”#FFFFFF” title_font=”Gilda Display|600|||||||” title_font_size=”18px” closed_title_font=”Gilda Display||||||||” body_font=”Overpass||||||||” body_text_color=”#2b2b2b” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Cost: $20.00
When Needed: When an insured loan secures a variable rate mortgage note that provides for negative amortization terms, changes in the interest rate, or adding unpaid interest to the principal of the loan.
Protects: Provides coverage that the loan is not invalid, unenforceable, and there is no loss of priority due to negative amortization provisions in the loan.

[/et_pb_toggle][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” background_enable_color=”off” use_background_color_gradient=”on” background_color_gradient_stops=”rgba(236,236,236,0.8) 0%|rgba(236,236,236,0.8) 99%” background_color_gradient_overlays_image=”on” background_image=”https://clear2close.us/wp-content/uploads/2022/08/home-bg-scaled.jpg” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.17.6″ _module_preset=”default” width=”90%” max_width=”1200px” custom_margin=”0px||34px||false|false” custom_padding=”0px||0px||false|false” custom_css_main_element=”text-align:center;” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.17.6″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” text_text_color=”#000000″ header_2_font=”|700|||||||” header_2_text_align=”center” header_2_text_color=”#222d35″ header_2_font_size=”35px” text_orientation=”center” custom_margin=”0px||0px||false|false” custom_padding=”0px||0px||false|false” header_2_font_size_tablet=”35px” header_2_font_size_phone=”30px” header_2_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” header_2_line_height_tablet=”” header_2_line_height_phone=”1.3em” header_2_line_height_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]
